name: Archlike
description:
(Hack n Slash Loot RPG)

Description

Pass through arch gates separating dungeon environments filled with enemies and loot.

Become increasingly powerful as you go deeper and deeper to fight increasingly strong enemies and gather more powerful equipment. (all is lost upon death!)

The game appears to be playable in browser however I haven't done a lot of testing there.

Known Bugs

- Mouse sensitivity may differ slightly based on zoom?, unintended

- Some browsers seem to struggle with the game?
